ProcessDefinition.Title: Get the url of the extracted product.
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: The purpose of this process is get the url of an extraction process from a request identifier. The request identifier is provided by the result of an extraction process The return values are url of the data and the return process code (ok or error code) and the correponding message). The url can be empty is the extration has not be done yet (not done yet or in error)
